attributes.action: Permit Ex-Service Ghurkas to obtain UK Citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the duty of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, and Her Majesty's Sovereign Teritories, to show its gratitude for the dedication and sacrifice made by the members of the British Army's Ghurka Soldiers, by granting them, if desired, residency and/or British Citizenship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
